page.title: 16LEVENS HALL (continued)
page.content:
In l704 and again in l906, fire damaged parts of the building. Re-wiring was carried out in l982 together with re-roofing of the south wing and dry rot was cured in l985.
During the Summer months there are 33 staff made up of estate workers, gardners, administrative and kitchen staff and guides.
Nearly l60,000 people pay to visit the Hall each year which, together with Government grants help to maintain Levens Hall, primarily as the private home of the Bagot family, but secondly as an outstanding example of an English Country house steeped in history.
